## ACOUSTIC\_CONFIG\_BASE\_URL variable

Name of the 'rel' attribute of a link element used to configure the base URL

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ACOUSTIC_CONFIG_BASE_URL = "wch-config-base-url"
```
